reviewText: This is a special edition steelbook pack  collector's edition that comes with bonus features. BONUS features include behind the scenes featurettes, t4 movie trailers, and transformers advertisement commercials and others. THIS IS A MUST HAVE FOR ANY TRUE TRANSFORMERS FAN. This a Transformers 4 steel book with 3d blu ray/blu ray/bonus blu ray disk with extra features, with selectable audio and subtitle language selection.
